tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MarketBasketAnalysis (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ProductAssociations (
    association_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id1 INT,
    product_id2 INT,
    support FLOAT,
    confidence FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MarketBasketAnalysisRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE ProductAssociations (
    association_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id_1 INT,
    product_id_2 INT,
    support DECIMAL,
    confidence DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE CrossSellingOpportunities (
    opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    recommended_product_id INT,
    suitability_score DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE associations (
  association_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id1 INT,
  product_id2 INT,
  support DECIMAL(5, 4),
  confidence DECIMAL(5, 4)
);
